title: Unable to Verify E-Mail

replies.body: That's rather odd. I would go ahead and reach out to your EUNE account agents in a ticket to see if they can push through a manual email verification for you!
Do you know how long ticket responses usually take? It's not relevant to my problem, just curious since I'm impatient {{sticker:sg-lulu}}
NA tickets usually have about a 12ish hour response time. Mainly just due to how many players and tickets we have coming in.
